title: Taylor Swift popularized fighting for masters. Are more artists getting ownership?
description: Taylor Swift turned masters ownership from a behind-the-scenes conversation into a mainstream debate about artist autonomy. But how has that fight influenced other artists in the music industry?
content:
When Taylor Swiftappeared on the podcast New Heights in August, she said she'd been saving up to buy back her master recordings since she was a teenager.
